name: NPR
text:
Listen to Billie Eilish's new song "My Future." Written and recorded in Los Angeles during lockdown, it's a dreamy ode to freedom.
https://t.co/YkmEUHEGA1

name: NPR
text:
A trillion dollars worth of American farmland will change hands in the coming years — as wealthy investors increasingly buy it up.

But their decisions, from hundreds of miles away, will have serious impacts on rural communities and the environment.
https://t.co/fX4wSd4AAi

name: NPR
text: Two members of the Philadelphia Phillies staff tested positive for the coronavirus following the team’s weekend series against the Miami Marlins, who paused their season due to a COVID-19 outbreak.  https://t.co/1yHT1OUgG5

name: NPR
text:
"He believed that in all of us, there exists the capacity for great courage, that in all of us there is a longing to do what's right."

Read Barack Obama's emotional eulogy for John Lewis:
https://t.co/znlMk6TbfR

name: NPR
text:
Voters in Missouri will soon decide whether to expand eligibility for the state's Medicaid program to provide insurance to more than 230,000 additional people.

If it passes, coverage for the newly eligible would begin in 2021.
https://t.co/U75LMCayZI
